p: Human breast epithelial cells (MCF-12A, ATCC CRL-10782) ( Vorster et al, 2012) human breast cancer cells (SKBR 3, ATCC HTB-30) ( Quirantes-Piné et al, 2013) and human cervix cancer cells (HeLa, ATCC CCL-2) ( Lu et al, 2010) were used for cytotoxicity tests and the cytotoxicity of 500 and 1000 µg.mL −1 of extracts were determined according to the protocol provided by WST-1 Cell proliferation assay kit (Cayman).
